product_name: The North Face Hedgefrog Water Shoes - Girls'
long_description: Hedgefrog multisport water shoes from The North Face are a great choice for water-filled adventures. Water-friendly synthetic nubuck leather uppers with quick-drying synthetic stretch-mesh provide ample protection and support. Quick-pull lacing system secures with a cordlock for fast, hassle-free fit adjustments; lace garage tucks away laces at top of tongue. Synthetic linings are naturally hydrophobic, so they won't soak up water and weigh you down or create discomfort. X-2(TM) footbeds add cushioning and support underfoot. Lightweight, compression-molded EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and shock absorption. Nonmarking sticky rubber outsoles feature a low-profile tread to provide excellent traction on slick and wet surfaces.
short_description: Hedgefrog multisport water shoes from The North Face are a great choice for water-filled adventures.
